content: उत्कंठ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [उन्नतः कंठो यस्य] {@--1@} Having the neck uplifted, ready, on the point of (doing anything), in <ab>comp.</ab>; आज्ञावचनोत्कंठः <ls>Ś. 2</ls>; रथस्वनोत्कंठमृगे वाल्मीकीये तपोवने <ls>R. 15. 11.</ls> {@--2@} (Hence) Anxious. eager. --ठः , --ठा A mode of sexual enjoyment.
